item.title: This Website!
item.description: Github Link My philosophy of what makes a good website: I have always been fascinated with how people use the programs that they do on a daily basis. As a technophile who likes to use programs which both look nice and function well I first considered going into website design when entering college. Website design was my original ambitions until I took some more advanced classes and noticed that it was not the actual user interface but the streamlining of workflows which actually interested me.

item.title: GoDex
item.description: GoDex and Object Oriented Programming The first GoDex was the final project for my iOS app development 1 class. It was also my first large programming project which was made significantly easier by also taking the object oriented programming class at the same time. I already had knowledge of data structures and certain important algorithms but the knolwledge of how to put everything I had learned already into one big project was invaluable.
